!!! info ""

    #### General troubleshooting commands

    ```bash

    show system uptime

    show chassis cluster information | no-more

    show chassis cluster information detail | no-more

    show configuration chassis cluster | no-more

    show chassis cluster status | no-more

    show chassis cluster status redundancy-group 0 | no-more

    show log chassisd | no-more

    show log jsrpd | match "Dec 3" | no-more

    show services ip-monitoring status | no-more

    show configuration services ip-monitoring | no-more

    KMD_VPN_DOWN_ALARM_USER
    ```
